description: Bergenia DRAGONFLY ANGEL KISS is an amazing plant species that will make your garden look amazing! Its foliage is deep, dark green and its flowers are outstanding and vibrant. Its blooms are abundant and clustered in clusters, creating a stunning contrast against the foliage. On top of that, the blooms come in a variety of colors, ranging from lovely purples and pink, to graceful whites and oranges. Not only that, but Bergenia DRAGONFLY ANGEL KISS is also amazingly easy to care for, needing only a little bit of water and some occasional trimming to keep looking its best. So if you're looking for an amazing, ornamental plant that you can use to spruce up your garden, look no further than Bergenia DRAGONFLY ANGEL KISS.
